heroSection.title: Dubai's Mobile Car Experts
heroSection.description: Experience the convenience of our mobile car repair service by scheduling a package. Enjoy professional car care on your schedule, right at your doorstep

package.subTitle: Parts that are not included can be requested, with an additional cost, upon booking the service

healthCheck.subTitle: Complimentary with every mobile oil change

carServiceCTA.title: Get automotive expertise from the comfort of your couch. This is car service, delivered.

genuinePartsBanner.title: From our parts to our labour, everything's genuine and manufacturer-approved.

steps.subtitle: Parts that are not included can be requested, with an additional cost, upon booking the service

items.title: Book a mobile car service package
items.description: Book a mobile car service online, or on the Service My Car app.

items.title: Book a mobile car service package
items.description: Our trusty mobile car mechanic will arrive at the location provided in the booking.

items.title: Your car gets fixed
items.description: Congrats! You've successfully gotten your car fixed at your doorstep.
